entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Corner Brook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 09:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.6°C
Wind: SW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
